title: Create your own ranking of NHS Clinical Networks
description: By attributing a subjective score to the waiting times in getting a referral, the model ranks the NHS Clinical Networks accordingly. Data courtesy of MNDA.

title: Risk Assurance Dashboard
description: Displaying the Risk Assurance of an organisation through colour-coded bars based on a simple and fully customisabile model

title: Census 2021 Dashboard
description: Explore the demographics of Waltham Forest, create your own cross-sections by taking advantage of the new multivariate ONS datasets
